Function Documentation

int c_entry ( void   ) 

c_entry: Main program body

Parameters:
[in] None 
Returns:
int

Use: LEDs for polling when idle and when GPIO interrupt occurs If using MCB1700 board: Polling led: P1.28; Interrupt led: P1.29 If using IAR KS board: Polling led: P1.25 (LED1); Interrupt led: P0.4 (LED2)
